name: Halloween Panic Palace
description:
Fullscreen recommended.

Controls: arrow keys, space

Guide a nosy trick or treater away from danger. Use candy to lead him in the right direction. Let him eat the candy to score points. Block monsters from reaching their snack.

It's halloween night and your dark master ain't home. In his infinite wisdom he left
you with infinite amount of candy for that occasion. But what is it?! As the doorbell rings real Monsters start roaming the palace!

And so begins ...

Halloween Panic Palace!

Retro styled halloween themed arcade game made for Devtober 2021.

Theme music by Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio
